release.description: This release of the Inspect Tool is a component of the integrated release 9.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Continued improvement of the interface for usability.

release.description: This release of the Inspect Tool is a component of the integrated release 8.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added support for visualization of PDS4 image products.

release.description: This release of the Inspect Tool is a component of the integrated release 8.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Initial release of the Inspect Tool supporting visualization of PDS4 table products.
